segments.text: This kitchen really is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water on the floor is quite alarming to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just so disgusted by the oversight; how can this go on for so long?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is likely seeping into the cabinets and damaging everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of water damage and mold makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's obliviousness to her soggy foot is truly perplexing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress hem must surely be getting wet by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the precarious stool, balanced by the eager cookie thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could give way at any second, sending him sprawling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a series of escalating hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to step in and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frustrating display of domestic chaos left unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My stomach churns with apprehension for what's to come.
segments.speaker: PAR
